Example of a master_matrix object with no preselected sites

Source: R/data_documentation.R
m_matrix.Rd

An S3 object of class master_matrix. See function prepare_master_matrix.

m_matrix

Format

A list of 6 elements:

data_matrix

data.frame with 6276 rows and 10 columns

preselected_sites

NULL

region

object of class SpatialPolygons*

mask

NULL

raster_base

object of class RasterLayer

PCA_results

list of length 5

Examples

data("m_matrix", package = "biosurvey")

print(m_matrix)

#> data_matrix:
